title: Diff Eq Given Slope expression part - b

content.question: Find an expression for y = f(x) by solving the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mi>y</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4217@</annotation> </semantics> </math> with initial condition f(2) = -8.

frqParts.text: Find an expression for y = f(x) by solving the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mi>y</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4217@</annotation> </semantics> </math> with initial condition f(2) = -8.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
